title: Request to acquire rights for public use of additional trails and accesses
context: ยง198D-8 Request to acquire rights for public use of additional trails and accesses. The department may request the legislature for appropriations to acquire rights to trails and accesses which are closed to public use or which are necessary to effectuate the trail and access program. [L 1988, c 236, pt of ยง2; am L 1993, c 273, ยง2]
